title: Korea: Citi Card Launches Facebook Page and Introduces Ways to Enjoy Premium Dining Service
summary: Seoul, Korea - Citi Card has become very popular due to its premium dining service that provides a 10 percent discount or free menu items at nearly 1,000 restaurants. Recently, Citi Card launched an official Facebook page (www.facebook.com/citikorea) and hosted several events that offered dining, ice cream and coffee gift coupons to 2,012 participants.
tag-1: Korea: Citi Card Launches Facebook Page and Introduces Ways to Enjoy Premium Dining Service
tag-3: Seoul, Korea – Citi Card has become very popular due to its premium dining service that provides a 10 percent discount or free menu items at nearly 1,000 restaurants. Recently, Citi Card launched an official Facebook page (www.facebook.com/citikorea) and hosted several events that offered dining, ice cream and coffee gift coupons to 2,012 participants.
tag-4: Through the Facebook page, Citi Card will advertise the premium dining service's concept, which is "happy dining, best benefits." Also, Citi Card will actively communicate with customers, introducing discount benefits, interesting stories and useful information about dining and wine.
tag-5: Citi Card launched three events to celebrate the launch of its Facebook page.
tag-6: Citibank Korea representatives say, "Citi Card will continue to fully utilize its Facebook page to share information about dining and wine and communicate effectively with customers. Thus, Citi Card will strengthen its customer-friendly image."
tag-7: Citi Citi, the leading global bank, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management.
tag-8: Additional information may be found at www.citigroup.com | Twitter: @Citi | YouTube: www.youtube.com/citi | Blog: http://blog.citigroup.com | Facebook: www.facebook.com/citi | LinkedIn: www.linkedin.com/company/citi
tag-9: Citibank Korea Inc. Citibank had opened its first branch in Korea in 1967, and was born newly as Citibank Korea Inc. (CKI) through integration with KorAm Bank in 2004. CKI serves customers at 220 branches (as of end of March 2012) in Korea by providing the first class financial products and services based on the various products and know-how of Citi with global network including 200 years of history and 200 million customers in more than 160 countries. CKI delivers new financial world to the customers through development of innovative financial products and services, encompassing from corporate and investment banking to consumer banking, private banking, and wealth management. Furthermore, Citibank Korea Inc., as a responsible corporate citizen, conducts diverse community activities in the areas of financial education, next generation education, women, diversity, community, and environment consistently in corporation with sound non-profit organizations.
